src:
Hisoblagichlar bo‘yicha onlayn ariza yuborish xizmati ishga tushmagani ma’lum qilindi

03 Nov 2019, 08:55

Joriy yilning 1-noyabridan boshlab, elektr energiyasi, tabiiy gaz, ichimlik va issiq suvni hisobga olish uskunalarini (hisoblagichlarni) yechish, qiyoslashdan o‘tkazish va o‘rnatish uchun ariza yuborish Davlat xizmatlari markazlari orqali amalga oshirilishi belgilangan edi.


Foto: Google Images

Davlat xizmatlari agentligi matbuot xizmatining ma’lum qilishicha, hukumat qarori bilan Energetika vazirligi va Uy-joy kommunal xizmat ko‘rsatish vazirligiga tegishli tarzda Yagona interaktiv davlat xizmatlari portaliga ulanish vazifasi yuklatilgan.
Mavzuga doir: Tabiiy gaz hisoblagichini yechish va o‘rnatishga onlayn tarzda ariza yuborish mumkin bo‘ldi
Biroq ayrim texnik sabablarga ko‘ra, ushbu tashkilotlar davlat xizmatlari ko‘rsatilishi uchun zarur bo‘lgan ma’lumotlar bazasini Yagona interaktiv davlat xizmatlari portaliga ulashga ulgurmagan.
Mazkur davlat idoralari tomonidan o‘zlariga yuklatilgan vazifalar amalga oshirilgandan so‘ng Davlat xizmatlari markazlari orqali ushbu davlat xizmatlarini olish mumkin bo‘ladi.
Ushbu masala Davlat xizmatlari agentligi tomonidan nazoratga olingani aytilgan.
text:
It is reported that the online application for calculators has not been launched

03 Nov 2019, 08:55

Starting November 1, 2013, applications for removal, verification and installation of electricity, natural gas, drinking and hot water metering devices will be submitted through the Public Service Centers.


Photo: Google Images

According to the press service of the State Services Agency, the Ministry of Energy and Housing and Communal Services has been tasked with connecting the Single interactive state services portal to the Ministry of Energy.
Topic: Online application for unblocking and installing natural gas meters
However, for some technical reasons, these organizations have not yet been able to connect the database required for public services to the Unified State Services Portal.
Once these government agencies carry out their tasks, these public services will be available through the Public Service Centers.
The matter was reportedly taken under control by the State Services Agency.
